name: Auto-fixing Output Parser
natural_language_description: 这是 Auto-fixing Output Parser 节点。主要用于: Deprecated, use structured output parser

info.displayName: This node wraps another output parser. If the first one fails it calls an LLM to fix the format
info.name: info
info.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node wraps another output parser. If the first one fails it calls an LLM to fix the format

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: prompt (值: None) - Prompt template used for fixing the output. Uses placeholders: "{instructions}" for parsing rules, "{completion}" for the failed attempt, and "{error}" for the validation error message.
